00017 #include "MisrReadData.h"
00018 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00019 #include "MisrMapQuery.h"
00020 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00021 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00022 #include "MisrError.h"
00023 #include <mfhdf.h>
00024 #include <HdfEosDef.h>

00037 MTKt_status MtkReadConv(
00038   const char *filename,     
00039   const char *gridname,     
00040   const char *fieldname,    
00041   MTKt_Region region,       
00042   MTKt_DataBuffer *databuf, 
00043   MTKt_MapInfo *mapinfo      )
00044 {
00045   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00046   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00047   int32 fid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS File id */
00048   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF return status */
00049 
00050   if (filename == NULL) return MTK_NULLPTR;
00051 
00052   /* Open file. */
00053   fid = GDopen((char*)filename, DFACC_READ);
00054   if (fid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00055 
00056   /* Read data. */
00057   status = MtkReadConvFid(fid, gridname, fieldname, region, databuf, mapinfo);
00058   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00059 
00060   /* Close file. */
00061   hdfstatus = GDclose(fid);
00062   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00063   fid = FAIL;
00064 
00065   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00066  ERROR_HANDLE:
00067   if (fid != FAIL) GDclose(fid);
00068   return status_code;
00069 }
00070 
00076 MTKt_status MtkReadConvFid(
00077   int32 fid,                
00078   const char *gridname,     
00079   const char *fieldname,    
00080   MTKt_Region region,       
00081   MTKt_DataBuffer *databuf, 
00082   MTKt_MapInfo *mapinfo      )
00083 {
00084   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00085   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00086   MTKt_DataBuffer buf = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00087                                 /* Data buffer structure */
00088   MTKt_DataBuffer filebuf_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00089                                 /* Temp data buffer structure for file */
00090   MTKt_DataBuffer fill = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00091                                 /* Fill buffer structure */
00092   MTKt_MapInfo map = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00093                 /* Map info structure */
00094   MTKt_MapInfo mapfile = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00095                 /* Map info structure for the file */
00096   int path;         /* Path */
00097   int resolution;       /* Resolution */ 
00098   MTKt_SomCoord ulc_som = MTKT_SOMCOORD_INIT;
00099                 /* ULC SOM coordinates */
00100   MTKt_SomCoord lrc_som = MTKT_SOMCOORD_INIT;
00101                 /* LRC SOM coordinates */
00102   double x;         /* Som X */
00103   int ulc_line;         /* ULC Line */
00104   int ulc_sample;       /* ULC Sample */
00105   int lrc_line;         /* LRC Line */
00106   int lrc_sample;       /* LRC Sample */
00107   float line;           /* Line */
00108   float sample;         /* Sample */
00109   int nline;            /* Number of line */
00110   int nsample;          /* Number of sample */
00111   int l;            /* Line index */
00112   int s;            /* Sample index */
00113   MTKt_DataType datatype;   /* Datatype */
00114   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF-EOS return status */
00115   int32 gid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS Grid id */
00116   int32 start[10];      /* HDF-EOS start dimension */
00117   int32 edge[10];       /* HDF-EOS edge dimension */
00118   int32 hdf_datatype;       /* HDF-EOS data type */
00119   int32 rank;           /* HDF-EOS rank */
00120   int32 dims[10];       /* HDF-EOS dimensions */
00121   char dimlist[80];     /* HDF-EOS dimension name list */
00122   char *basefield = NULL;   /* Base fieldname */
00123   int nextradims;               /* Number of extra dimensions */
00124   int *extradims = NULL;    /* Extra dimension list */
00125   int i;            /* Loop index */
00126   int32 xdimsize;       /* X dimension size of file */
00127   int32 ydimsize;       /* Y dimension size of file */
00128   float64 ulc[2];       /* Upper left corner in meters */
00129   float64 lrc[2];       /* Lower right corner in meters */
00130   char *dataptr;        /* Data pointer */
00131   int32           HDFfid;   /* HDF file identifier (not used) */
00132   int32         sid;        /* HDF SD identifier */
00133 
00134   if (gridname == NULL) return MTK_NULLPTR;
00135   if (fieldname == NULL) return MTK_NULLPTR;
00136 
00137   /* Get the HDF SD identifier. */
00138   hdfstatus = EHidinfo(fid, &HDFfid, &sid);
00139   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00140     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_EHIDINFO_FAILED);
00141 
00142   /* Determine path of this file */
00143   status = MtkFileToPathFid(sid, &path);
00144   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00145 
00146   /* Determine resolution from file and gridname */
00147   status = MtkFileGridToResolutionFid(fid, gridname, &resolution);
00148   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00149 
00150   /* Snap region to som grid for this path */
00151   status = MtkSnapToGrid(path, resolution, region, &map);
00152   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00153 
00154   /* Attach to grid */
00155   gid = GDattach(fid, (char*)gridname);
00156   if (gid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDATTACH_FAILED);
00157 
00158   /* Get grid info */
00159   hdfstatus = GDgridinfo(gid, &xdimsize, &ydimsize, ulc, lrc);
00160   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDGRIDINFO_FAILED);
00161 
00162   /* Parse fieldname for extra dimensions */
00163   status = MtkParseFieldname(fieldname, &basefield, &nextradims, &extradims);
00164   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00165 
00166   /* Determine rank, dimensions and datatype of the field */
00167   hdfstatus = GDfieldinfo(gid, basefield, &rank, dims, &hdf_datatype, dimlist);
00168   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDFIELDINFO_FAILED);
00169 
00170   /* Check range against extra dimensions */
00171   if (rank != nextradims + 2) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00172 
00173   /* Convert hdf datatype to mtk datatype */
00174   status = MtkHdfToMtkDataTypeConvert(hdf_datatype, &datatype);
00175   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00176 
00177   /* Create a map structure for the contents of the file, then we can */
00178   /* determine the coordinates of the intersecting map area we need to load */
00179   /* Note - ulc y and lrc y are flipped. */
00180   mapfile = map;
00181   mapfile.nline = dims[0];
00182   mapfile.nsample = dims[1];
00183   mapfile.som.ulc.x = ulc[0];
00184   mapfile.som.ulc.y = lrc[1];
00185   mapfile.som.lrc.x = lrc[0];
00186   mapfile.som.lrc.y = ulc[1];
00187   mapfile.som.ctr.x = mapfile.som.ulc.x + 
00188     ((mapfile.som.lrc.x - mapfile.som.ulc.x) / 2.0);
00189   mapfile.som.ctr.y = mapfile.som.ulc.y + 
00190     ((mapfile.som.lrc.y - mapfile.som.ulc.y) / 2.0);
00191 
00192   /* Determine ulc line and sample of intersecting area. */
00193   /* If out of bounds then clip to size of file coordinates. */
00194   /* The status of this routine can be ignored because we catch */
00195   /* out of bounds when line or sample is -1.0. */
00196   /* Also, subtract half a pixel to center coordinate. */
00197   MtkSomXYToLS(mapfile, map.som.ulc.x, map.som.ulc.y, &line, &sample);
00198 
00199   line -= 0.5;
00200   sample -= 0.5;
00201 
00202   if (line < 0.0) ulc_line = 0;
00203   else ulc_line = (int)line;
00204 
00205   if (sample < 0.0) ulc_sample = 0;
00206   else ulc_sample = (int)sample;
00207 
00208   /* Determine som x/y coordinates of ulc intersecting coordinate */
00209   status = MtkLSToSomXY(mapfile, (float)(ulc_line + 0.5), (float)(ulc_sample + 0.5), &ulc_som.x, &ulc_som.y);
00210   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00211 
00212   /* Determine lrc line and sample of intersecting area */
00213   /* If out of bounds then clip to size of file coordinates. */
00214   /* The status of this routine can be ignored because we catch */
00215   /* out of bounds when line or sample is -1.0. */
00216   /* Also, subtract half a pixel to center coordinate. */
00217   MtkSomXYToLS(mapfile, map.som.lrc.x, map.som.lrc.y, &line, &sample);
00218 
00219   line -= 0.5;
00220   sample -= 0.5;
00221 
00222   if (line < 0.0) lrc_line = dims[0] - 1;
00223   else lrc_line = (int)line;
00224 
00225   if (sample < 0.0) lrc_sample = dims[1] - 1;
00226   else lrc_sample = (int)sample;
00227 
00228   /* Determine som x/y coordinates of lrc intersecting coordinate */
00229   status = MtkLSToSomXY(mapfile, (float)(lrc_line + 0.5), (float)(lrc_sample + 0.5), &lrc_som.x, &lrc_som.y);
00230   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00231 
00232   /* Determine number of lines and samples of the intersecting area to load */
00233   nline = lrc_line - ulc_line + 1;
00234   nsample = lrc_sample - ulc_sample + 1;
00235 
00236   start[0] = ulc_line;
00237   start[1] = ulc_sample;
00238 
00239   edge[0] = nline;
00240   edge[1] = nsample;
00241 
00242   for (i = 2; i < rank; i++) {
00243     start[i] = extradims[i-2];
00244     edge[i] = 1;
00245   }
00246 
00247   /* Allocate the temp data buffer */
00248   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(nline, nsample, datatype, &filebuf_tmp);
00249   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00250 
00251   /* Read field data */
00252   hdfstatus = GDreadfield(gid, basefield, start, NULL, edge, 
00253               filebuf_tmp.dataptr);
00254   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDREADFIELD_FAILED);
00255 
00256   /* Detach from grid */
00257   hdfstatus = GDdetach(gid);
00258   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDDETACH_FAILED);
00259 
00260   /* Allocate the data buffer */
00261   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(map.nline, map.nsample, datatype, &buf);
00262   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00263 
00264   /* Get fill value and prefill buffer only if a fill value is defined */
00265   status = MtkFillValueGetFid(fid, gridname, fieldname, &fill);
00266   if (status == MTK_SUCCESS) {
00267     dataptr = (char *)buf.dataptr;
00268     for (l = 0; l < map.nline; l++) {
00269       for (s = 0; s < map.nsample; s++) {
00270     memcpy((void *)dataptr, fill.dataptr, buf.datasize);
00271     dataptr += buf.datasize;
00272       }
00273     }
00274     MtkDataBufferFree(&fill);
00275   }
00276 
00277   /* Copy intersecting region to output buffer */
00278   i = 0;
00279   for (x = ulc_som.x; x <= lrc_som.x; x += map.resolution) {
00280     MtkSomXYToLS(map, x, ulc_som.y, &line, &sample);
00281     memcpy((void *)&(buf.data.u8[(int)line][(int)sample]),
00282        (void *)&(filebuf_tmp.data.u8[i++][0]),
00283        nsample * buf.datasize);
00284   }
00285 
00286   free(basefield);
00287   free(extradims);
00288   MtkDataBufferFree(&filebuf_tmp);
00289 
00290   *databuf = buf;
00291   *mapinfo = map;
00292 
00293   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00294  ERROR_HANDLE:
00295   if (gid != FAIL) GDdetach(gid);
00296   if (basefield != NULL) free(basefield);
00297   if (extradims != NULL) free(extradims);
00298   MtkDataBufferFree(&filebuf_tmp);
00299   MtkDataBufferFree(&buf);
00300   return status_code;
00301 }
